Claim: "A child with blond hair is being held by his mother at the mall."
Implication: "A child is being held by his mother at the mall."
Referring expressions: Child, blond hair, mother, mall  A child, his mother, mall
Formula: (exists c (exists a (exists d (IsBlond(c) and IsHeldBy(d) and IsAtMall(a)))) & (forall h (forall g (  IsHeldBy(g) ->  IsBeingHeldBy(h)))) & (forall i (forall j ( IsBeingHeldBy(i) ->   IsHeldBy(j))))) -> (exists f (exists a (IsBeingHeldBy(f) and IsAtMall(a))))
